item.title: 美国股票基金创八周来最大单周流入量
item.description: 截至 5 月 15 日的七天内，美国股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，原因是在美国就业数据低迷和通胀数据低于预期的情况下，市场对美联储降息的预期推波助澜。【原文：U.S. equity funds attracted significant inflows in the seven days to May 15, fuelled by expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts following subdued U.S. jobs data and a softer-than-anticipated inflation reading.】

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官认为欧洲因人工智能电力需求而面临 "巨大问题
item.description: 贝莱德公司首席执行官周五表示，支持人工智能（AI）技术的数据中心所需的巨大电力供应将造成各国之间的竞争问题，并使欧洲处于不利地位。【原文：The enormous power supply required by data centres to support artificial intelligence (AI) technologies will create competitive issues among countries and put Europe at a disadvantage, the CEO of BlackRock said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，大众与雷诺结束开发经济型电动汽车的谈判
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，大众汽车已退出与雷诺联合开发经济型电动版 Twingo 汽车的谈判，这使欧盟汽车制造商抵御中国竞争对手的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：Volkswagen has walked away from talks with Renault to jointly develop an affordable electric version of the Twingo car, two sources familiar with the situation said, in a setback for the EU carmakers' efforts to fend off Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 降息希望和疲软的美国经济数据吸引全球股票基金流入
item.description: 在截至 5 月 15 日的七天里，全球股票基金连续第三周受到强劲需求的推动，原因是美国就业报告疲软，通胀数据低于预期，这增加了人们对美联储可能在今年开始降息的预期。【原文：Global equity funds experienced strong demand for the third consecutive week, in the seven days to May 15, bolstered by a softer U.S. jobs report and lower-than-expected inflation figures, which increased expectations that the Federal Reserve may begin cutting rates this year.】

item.title: GameStop 预计第一季度收入下降，股价暴跌
item.description: GameStop 预计第一季度的净销售额将比去年同期有所下降，原因是顾客转向在网上购买视频游戏和收藏品，而该零售商主要依靠实体店。【原文：GameStop expects first-quarter net sales to drop from a year ago, as customers transition to buying video games and collectibles online, while the retailer largely relies on brick and mortar stores.】

item.title: 与 OpenAI 合作后 Reddit 股价大涨
item.description: Reddit 与人工智能公司 OpenAI 建立合作关系后，其股价周五上涨了 14%，该合作有望通过人工智能增强的体验为社交媒体平台吸引更多用户，并吸引更多广告收入。【原文：Shares of Reddit rose 14% on Friday, following a partnership with artificial intelligence firm OpenAI that is expected to draw in more users for the social media platform with AI-enhanced experience and attract more advertising revenue.】

item.title: 美国道指逼近 4 万点，中国抗击住宅市场萧条
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 卢比走软可能无法阻止加拿大央行与美联储的分歧
item.description: 一项草根民意调查显示，七位分析师的估计中值显示，在货币下跌威胁到通胀前景之前，加拿大央行愿意在美联储首次降息之前降息三次。【原文：The Bank of Canada would be willing to cut interest rates three times ahead of the Federal Reserve's first move before a declining currency threatens to endanger the inflation outlook, the median estimate of seven analysts in a straw poll showed.】

item.title: Endeavor 130 亿美元交易凸显避开少数股东的推动力
item.description: Endeavor 集团决定不让小股东否决将这家娱乐集团私有化的 130 亿美元交易，这是公司控股投资者为避免支付更高的交易价格而冒险提起诉讼的最新例子。【原文：Endeavor Group's decision to deny minority shareholders the ability to veto a $13 billion deal to take the entertainment conglomerate private is the latest example of a company's controlling investors risking lawsuits to avoid paying a higher deal price.】

item.title: 尽管消费者监督机构在美国最高法院胜诉，但该机构的权力仍在砧板上
item.description: 美国最高法院保护消费者金融保护局--美国消费者金融监督机构--的裁决赢得了强有力的联邦监管支持者的赞誉。但他们对法院的赞誉可能是短暂的。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court's decision safeguarding the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau - the nation's consumer finance watchdog - earned plaudits from supporters of robust federal regulation. But their praise for the court may prove short-lived.】

item.title: 交易回暖，高盛寻求扩大私募股权投资信贷额度
item.description: 美国投资银行高盛（Goldman Sachs）正大举进军私募股权和资产管理公司的贷款市场，计划进行海外扩张，帮助填补地区性银行动荡和瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）出售后留下的空白。【原文：U.S. investment bank Goldman Sachs is muscling into the lending market for private equity and asset managers, planning an overseas expansion as it helps fill a void left by turmoil at regional banks and the sale of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 香港允许在本地商店使用中国数字人民币
item.description: 香港事实上的中央银行负责人周五表示，香港将允许中国大陆的试点数字货币在香港的商店中使用，这标志着在地缘政治紧张局势不断加剧的情况下，中国政府将人民币国际化的努力又向前迈进了一步。【原文：Hong Kong will allow mainland China's pilot digital currency to be used in shops in the city, the head of its de facto central bank said on Friday, marking a step forward for Beijing's efforts to internationalise the yuan amid rising geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，必和必拓需要以每股约 32 英镑的价格收购盎格鲁集团
item.description: 摩根大通分析师在一份报告中说，必和必拓集团需要将其最新报价提高约30%，以反映英美资源集团及其主要铜资产的公允价值。【原文：BHP Group would need to boost its latest offer around 30% to reflect fair value for Anglo American and its key copper assets, JPMorgan analysts said in a note.】

item.title: 期货走低，反弹势头有所减弱
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货下滑，在消费者通胀数据不及预期、美联储降息希望的支撑下，华尔街一周的大幅上涨接近尾声。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Friday, near the end of a week of sharp Wall Street gains underpinned by hopes of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts after softer-than-expected consumer inflation data.】

item.title: UAW 的影响力在阿拉巴马州梅赛德斯-奔驰工厂工会关键投票中受到考验
item.description: 周五，阿拉巴马州一家梅赛德斯-奔驰工厂的工人进行了投票，投票结果将成为汽车工人联合会能否在历来反对工会的南方保持发展势头的关键性公投。【原文：The outcome of a vote on Friday by workers at a Mercedes-Benz factory in Alabama will be a key referendum on whether the United Auto Workers can maintain momentum in the historically anti-union South.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司与沃尔沃打算组建软件合资企业
item.description: 德国卡车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）和瑞典沃尔沃公司（Volvo）周五表示，两家公司打算成立一家合资企业，共同开发软件定义的汽车平台和专用卡车操作系统。【原文：German truck maker Daimler Truck and Sweden's Volvo intend to form a joint venture to develop a software-defined vehicle platform and dedicated truck operating system, the two companies said on Friday.】

item.title: Take Five：好、坏、丑
item.description: 在七国集团（G7）财长齐聚意大利之际，尽管贸易紧张局势加剧为市场蒙上了一层阴影，但市场仍希望能有证据证明全球经济前景光明。【原文：Markets are hoping for evidence that will solidify a brightening global economic outlook, though rising trade tensions are casting a cloud, while G7 finance ministers gather in Italy.】

item.title: Xpeng称美国对中国电动汽车征收关税不利于实现碳中和
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏周五表示，美国对中国电动汽车（EV）征收的新关税不利于实现碳中和和绿色能源转型。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng said on Friday new U.S. tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles (EV) are detrimental to achieving carbon neutrality and green energy transition.】

item.title: 独家报道马斯克推动中国数据计划，为特斯拉的人工智能雄心提供动力
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特斯拉正在推进利用来自中国的数据为其自动驾驶系统的全球开发提供动力的计划，这些数据可在中国境内处理，这也是埃隆-马斯克战略转移的一部分。【原文：Tesla is pushing ahead with plans to power the global development of its self-driving system with data from China that could be processed within the country, part of a strategic shift by Elon Musk, according to people with knowledge of the work.】

item.title: 对冲基金博弈日元疲软
item.description: 日本支撑日元疲软的压力可能已经减弱，但货币疲软仍是东京头疼的问题。【原文：Pressure on Japan to prop up a weak yen may have ebbed, but currency weakness remains a headache for Tokyo.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，上海编制了符合加快海外转移条件的数据清单
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份政府文件，上海已经编制了一份无需安全评估即可向海外传输数据的清单，这是中国试图吸引外资以提振疲软经济的一个备受期待的举措。【原文：Shanghai has compiled a list of data that can be transferred overseas without security assessments, according to a government document seen by Reuters, a much anticipated move as China tries to lure foreign investment to boost a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，丰田在墨西哥工厂多次停工，原因是供应商遭遇工人短缺
item.description: 据了解丰田汽车运营情况的人士称，由于当地劳动力短缺，供应商的产量受阻，丰田汽车被迫在 2 月和 3 月多次停止墨西哥工厂的生产。【原文：Toyota Motor was forced to repeatedly halt production at a Mexico plant in February and March after local labour shortages snarled output at suppliers, according to people with knowledge of the automaker's operations.】

item.title: 通胀忧虑消退，投资者将资金投入股票和债券 - 美国银行称
item.description: 美国银行（BofA）周五的研究显示，在截至本周三的一周内，投资者将资金投入股票和债券市场，青睐公用事业股等落后股票，但从科技股等市场价格较高的股票中撤出资金。【原文：Investors poured money into stocks and bonds in the week to Wednesday, favouring laggards such as utilities, but pulling money from pricier parts of the market such as technology stocks, BofA research showed on Friday.】

item.title: 日元疲软打击消费支出，日本央行或面临更大加息压力
item.description: 日本的消费疲软可能会加剧而不是减轻对央行的政治压力，迫使央行提高利率，以减缓日元的跌势，因为进口成本的增加会损害家庭的利益。【原文：Japan's weak consumption may heighten, rather than tame, already growing political pressure on the central bank to raise interest rates to slow the yen's declines blamed for hurting households via higher import costs.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克通过折价出售 Haleon 股份融资 15 亿美元
item.description: 英国制药商葛兰素史克周五表示，该公司已通过出售其在消费者保健公司 Haleon 的全部剩余股份筹集了 12.5 亿英镑（15.2 亿美元）的资金。【原文：GSK has raised 1.25 billion pounds ($1.52 billion) from selling its entire remaining stake in consumer healthcare firm Haleon, the British drugmaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 预计中国 5 月贷款利率将保持不变
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，人们普遍预计中国将在周一保持基准贷款利率稳定，不过，随着中国政府努力刺激住房需求，人们对下调抵押贷款基准利率的预期也在增加。【原文：China is widely expected to hold benchmark lending rates steady on Monday, a Reuters survey showed, although expectations are growing for a cut in the mortgage reference rate as the authorities scramble to boost housing.】

item.title: 英国杂货商塞恩斯伯里公司与微软合作，利用人工智能洞察数据
item.description: 英国森斯伯瑞公司周五表示，它已与微软达成了一项为期五年的战略合作伙伴关系，将利用微软的人工智能能力和超市集团的丰富数据。【原文：Britain's Sainsbury's said on Friday it has agreed a five-year strategic partnership with Microsoft that will use the technology company's artificial intelligence capabilities and the supermarket group's rich data.】

item.title: 日本通胀可能再度放缓，成本压力或将缓解
item.description: 周五，路透社对 18 位经济学家进行的调查显示，日本 4 月份的核心消费通胀可能连续第二个月环比放缓，成本推动压力可能有所缓解。【原文：Japan's core consumer inflation probably slowed for a second straight month in April from a year earlier, a Reuters poll of 18 economists showed on Friday, likely easing cost-push pressure.】

item.title: 在美元坚挺和美联储不确定性的背景下，4月份外国人抛售亚洲债券
item.description: 由于美元走强和美联储降息的不确定性抑制了投资者的投资热情，4 月份外国投资者连续第二个月成为亚洲债券的净卖家。【原文：Foreign investors were net sellers of Asian bonds for a second straight month in April as a strong U.S. dollar and uncertainties around the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts dampened appetite.】

item.title: ABB 收购西门子在中国的配线附件业务
item.description: 瑞士工程集团 ABB 周五表示，已同意收购德国竞争对手西门子在中国的配线附件业务。【原文：ABB has agreed to buy the wiring accessories business of German rival Siemens in China, the Swiss engineering group said on Friday.】
